comments:
Build ID: N/A
Buckmister version:
  org.eclipse.buckminster.core.headless.feature_0.1.0.v20070515 (Buckminster - Core Headless (Incubation))
  org.eclipse.buckminster.cvs.headless.feature_0.1.0.v20070504 (Buckminster - CVS support for headless operation (Incubation))
  org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.feature_0.1.0.v20070515 (Buckminster - Maven support (Incubation))
  org.eclipse.buckminster.pde.headless.feature_0.1.0.v20070515-r32x (Buckminster - PDE support for headless operation (Incubation))
  org.eclipse.buckminster.product_0.1.0.v20070514-r32x (Buckminster Product (Incubation))
  org.eclipse.buckminster.svn.headless.feature_0.1.0.v20070507 (Buckminster - Subversion support for headless operation (Incubation))

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create a "test.bmscript" like this:
resolve --bomfile buckmister-headless.bom --noimport http://www.eclipse.org/buckminster/samples/queries/buckminster-headless.cquery
resolve --bomfile buckmister-extensions.bom --noimport file:/C:/Workspaces/testproject/buckminster-extensions.cquery

2. let the Buckminster interpret the script:
buckminster -data <your workspace> --displaystacktrace --scriptfile test.bmscript

3. You should get an exception similar to the following:
resolve '--bomfile' 'buckmister-headless.bom' '--noimport' 'http://www.eclipse.org/buckminster/samples/queries/buckminster-headless.cquery'
Using workspace at file:/C:/Workspaces/workspace-test-headless/...
Query complete.
resolve '--bomfile' 'buckmister-extensions.bom' '--noimport' 'file:/C:/Workspaces/testproject/buckminster-extensions.cquery'
Using workspace at file:/C:/Workspaces/workspace-test-headless/...

More information:
Both of the queries succeed when run one at a time.
This was caused by an incorrect way of shutting down the workspace manager in between commands. See bug 186753.
